data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Song, Xiao-Bin, Li, Li-Zhen (2014): Three new species of the myrmecophilous genus Doryloxenus from China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Aleocharinae). ZooKeys 456: 75-83, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.456.8584, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.456.8584
